InviteMessageTemplate.EmailMessage:
ONE MORE DAY ON THE APPALACHIAN TRAIL
Scholarship Review Board

----------------------------------------

Welcome to the Review Board!

You have been invited to join the One More Day on the AT scholarship review board. We are honored to have you help us select this year's scholarship recipient.

As a board member, you will:
  - Review applicant profiles
  - Watch video submissions
  - Share notes with other board members
  - Vote on each applicant (0-10 scale)


YOUR LOGIN CREDENTIALS

Username: {username}
Temporary Password: {####}


ACCESS THE REVIEW PORTAL

http://voting.onemoredayontheatapply.com

You'll be prompted to change your password on first login.

If you have any questions about the review process, please don't hesitate to reach out.


----------------------------------------

In Memory of Nate Loftis (1981-2019)
Honoring his memory by helping hikers achieve their dreams on the Appalachian Trail
